info.name: Canonn APIv2 Postman Test Collection
info.description:
An API for all the Science related information Canonn has in its datastores stored on the Gnosis, built using [Strapi](https://strapi.io) a Nodejs API framework. 

We have two different documentation types, our [Redocs](https://api.canonn.tech) or use the [Swagger-UI](https://api.canonn.tech/swaggerui)

We also have 3 API servers; Live (Production), Beta (Staging), Alpha (Development). You should use the Beta server for testing your application prior to using the Live server. The Alpha server is used by Canonn to test our changes prior to releasing a new version.

Data between the Live and Beta servers are replicated as needed, eventually we plan to dynamically replicate the data every night at midnight Phoenix, Arizona USA time (MST-Arizona GMT-7)

Here are the following URLs for each server

* Live - https://api.canonn.tech
* Beta - https://api.canonn.tech:2053
* Alpha - https://api.canonn.tech:2083

Thank you for your support, and thank you to all the CMDRs who supply us with our data!

item.name: Login to the Canonn APIv2 Server

request.description: Using local authentication to login to the API, user must already be registered

body.raw:
{
  "systemName": "ROSETTE SECTOR EL-Y D15",
  "bodyName": "2 B",
  "latitude": -3.3269,
  "longitude": 139.8931,
  "count": 1,
  "cmdrName": "Galactic Fork",
  "cmdrComment": "TEST - Bark Mound Report",
  "reportStatus": "pending"
}

request.description: To be used to submit new Reports to Canonn, note that the reportStatus should always be pending

item.name: Get a count of all BM Reports

request.description: The API will respond with just a number, which is the total amount of reports on this endpoint. This can be used to filter, limit, or page other get requests.

item.name: Get a list of BM Reports

request.description: By default limited to the first 100 entries. Use filters, searching, or paging to get specific entries.
You do not need to send the entire report again, you can send only changed fields
Provide the ID to get a single report
The response is just an empty JSON, deleting a report requires auth
